level.text: Intraindustry complaints and disputes may be considered pursuant to §§ 355, 356, and 368.

If issues in proceedings before a hearing panel present matters described in § 357.1, the Panel may hold investigative hearings pursuant to § 356. At the conclusion of such hearings, additional rules may be necessary to protect the public and the taxicab industry. The rules shall then be considered pursuant to § 358.
